name: Beatrice KATZ, Appellant, v. John J. LAMB and Mesirov Gelman Jaffe Cramer & Jamieson, Appellees

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Beatrice KATZ, Appellant, v. John J. LAMB and Mesirov Gelman Jaffe Cramer & Jamieson, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jonathan Wheeler, Philadelphia, for Beatrice Katz.
Anthony Creato, Philadelphia, for John J. Lamb and Mesirov Gelman Jaffe Cramer & Jamieson.
casebody.head_matter:
739 A.2d 161
Beatrice KATZ, Appellant, v. John J. LAMB and Mesirov Gelman Jaffe Cramer & Jamieson, Appellees.

Argued Oct. 19, 1999.
Decided Nov. 8, 1999.
Jonathan Wheeler, Philadelphia, for Beatrice Katz.
